CopilotSkus.ServicePlans: COPILOT_STUDIO_IN_COPILOT_FOR_M365, M365_COPILOT_SHAREPOINT, GRAPH_CONNECTORS_COPILOT, M365_COPILOT_CONNECTORS, M365_COPILOT_APPS, M365_COPILOT_TEAMS, M365_COPILOT_BUSINESS_CHAT, M365_COPILOT_INTELLIGENT_SEARCH

AllRelevantSkus.ServicePlans: COPILOT_STUDIO_IN_COPILOT_FOR_M365, M365_COPILOT_SHAREPOINT, GRAPH_CONNECTORS_COPILOT, M365_COPILOT_CONNECTORS, M365_COPILOT_APPS, M365_COPILOT_TEAMS, M365_COPILOT_BUSINESS_CHAT, M365_COPILOT_INTELLIGENT_SEARCH

TenantSharingLevel.Description: Tenant-wide sharing level (Disabled, ExternalUserSharingOnly, ExistingExternalUserSharingOnly, ExternalUserAndGuestSharing)

DefaultSharingLinkType.Description: Default sharing link type for new sharing links (None, Direct, Internal, AnonymousAccess)

FileAnonymousLinkType.Description: Anonymous link permissions for files (None, View, Edit)

FolderAnonymousLinkType.Description: Anonymous link permissions for folders (None, View, Edit)

RequireAnonymousLinksExpireInDays.Description: Days after which anonymous links expire (0 = no expiration)

ExternalUserExpirationRequired.Description: Whether external user invitations must have expiration dates

ExternalUserExpireInDays.Description: Default expiration period for external user access (days)

PreventExternalUsersFromResharing.Description: Whether external users are prevented from resharing content

ExternalSharingSettings.Note: External Identities Policy not available - may require specific licensing or tenant configuration

GuestUserRoleId.Description: Role template ID assigned to guest users (controls their permissions)

AllowInvitesFrom.Description: Who can invite external users (none, adminsAndGuestInviters, adminsGuestInvitersAndAllMembers, everyone)

AllowedToSignUpEmailBasedSubscriptions.Description: Whether users can sign up for email-based subscriptions

AllowedToUseSSPR.Description: Whether users can use Self-Service Password Reset

AllowEmailVerifiedUsersToJoinOrganizatio.Description: Whether email-verified users can join the organization without invitation

BlockMsolPowerShell.Description: Whether MSOL PowerShell access is blocked for users

AllowedToCreateSecurityGroups.Description: Whether users can create security groups

AllowedToCreateTenants.Description: Whether users can create new tenants

AllowedToReadOtherUsers.Description: Whether users can read other users' profiles

AllowedToReadBitlockerKeysForOwnedDevice.Description: Whether users can read BitLocker recovery keys for their own devices

PrivacyProfile.Description: Whether organization has configured privacy contact information

MarketingNotificationEmails.Description: Email addresses for marketing notifications from Microsoft

SecurityComplianceNotificationMails.Description: Email addresses for security and compliance notifications

TechnicalNotificationMails.Description: Email addresses for technical notifications about the tenant

AllowedCloudEndpoints.Description: Cloud endpoints allowed for cross-tenant access

IsServiceDefault.Description: Whether this policy uses service defaults (true) or has custom configuration (false)

TotalGuestUsers.Description: Number of guest users currently in the tenant

Impact.Description: Potential impact on Copilot data access and security considerations

ManualChecks.Name: Microsoft 365 Apps (channel/version) & network endpoints
ManualChecks.Guidance: Ensure supported update channel (Current Channel or Monthly Enterprise), and app/network requirements are satisfied.

ManualChecks.Name: App privacy settings & third-party cookies (Web)
ManualChecks.Guidance: Verify privacy controls for connected experiences; enable third-party cookies for Word/Excel/PowerPoint online Copilot.

ManualChecks.Name: Device-based licensing
ManualChecks.Guidance: Copilot is not available with device-based licensing for Microsoft 365 Apps.
